sys_remote_update_set.description:
Hi Jason,
As per below, the 'Publication Request' form is being transferred to the 'Facilities Planning & Support' division.
https://verisk.service-now.com/sd/form.do?sysparm_document_key=sc_cat_item,578c4950e9b6b100632930f8b22dd5c3
Please update the form to read: · Publications routed by Facilities Planning & Support Division.
In addition, modify the form's admin access and notifications to:
· Greg Cassella and Pamela Congress
The '$Records Storage Request' has already been modified with the above names.
Thanks Raul
sys_remote_update_set.name: JL - 2015-06-08 - Publication Request Update
